      Save a new user in the database
      Parameters:
      user - User to save
      Returns:
      Instance of the saved user
      Throws:
      SizeLimitExceededException - One field doesn't respect the database's limitations
      AuthenticationException - Username is already taken

    • getUser

      public User getUser(int id, User requester) throws MissingResourceException, org.springframework.security.authorization.AuthorizationDeniedException
      Return a User from the database if it has less priviledges
      Parameters:
      id - Target user's id
      requester - User who makes the request
      Returns:
      User
      Throws:
      MissingResourceException - User searched not found
      org.springframework.security.authorization.AuthorizationDeniedException - User has more priviledges than the reference

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser(int id, User requester) throws MissingResourceException, org.springframework.security.authorization.AuthorizationDeniedException
      Delete a user if it has less or equal privileges
      Parameters:
      id - Target user's id
      requester - User who makes the request
      Throws:
      MissingResourceException - User not found or already deleted
      org.springframework.security.authorization.AuthorizationDeniedException - Requester doesn't have enough priviledge
